channel.title: Need a little help
channel.description: Admins on my server can spawn. I have disabled trading,dropping, and selling to shops but they can still give players items by losing in the dueling arena. I am using a project insanity source..how can i disable staking or duel arena for admins?

item.title: Need a little help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“deleter164, post:3, topic:394623”]public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = false

located in src>server>config.

what would i add for dueling?[/quote]that isn’t where the actual code for that is though look in players folder i think

Read full topic

find where the admins cant trade is found and make a new one for dueling pretty simple google has a guide somewhere.
